light.description: The natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible

definitions.verb: To provide with light or lighting; illuminate.
definitions.adjective: Having a considerable or sufficient amount of natural light; not dark.
definitions.noun: The natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible.

lead.description: Cause a person or animal to go with one by holding them by the hand, halter, rope, etc. while moving forward

definitions.verb: The initiative in an action; an example for others to follow.
definitions.noun: The initiative in an action; an example for others to follow.

stand.description: To be in a position with both feet on the ground.

definitions.verb: An act of standing; an attitude or position of the body.
definitions.noun: A position with both feet on the ground.

work.description: To perform a task or job.

definitions.adverb: In a way that is effective or efficient.
definitions.verb: Activity involving mental or physical effort done in order to achieve a purpose or result.

change.description: To make a change or alteration.

definitions.verb: To make a change or alteration.

point.description: A numerical value representing a quantity or measure.

definitions.verb: A particular spot, place, or moment.
definitions.noun: A numerical value representing a quantity or measure.

play.description: To engage in an activity for enjoyment and recreation rather than a serious or practical purpose.

definitions.verb: Engage in activity for enjoyment and recreation rather than a serious or practical purpose.
definitions.noun: An activity for enjoyment and recreation rather than a serious or practical purpose.
